column1: Tomorrow's forecast suggests rain, so please remember to bring an umbrella.
I have finished reading the book you lent me last week, it was quite interesting.
The soccer game yesterday was exciting, our team won by two goals.
Have you finished your science project on renewable energy sources?
Are we still meeting at the library after school to study for the history exam?
Did you complete the homework for math class today
I am reading a new book about dinosaurs; it's fascinating
Can you teach me how to solve that tricky puzzle you mentioned
We should plan a study session for the science test next week
My family is going on a trip this weekend to the mountains
